description: Le Bon de Cuisine is the premier Vietnamese/ French Mobile Food Truck in the Bay Area! We serve up special Vietnamese sandwiches with a French flare. Come Find us!Le Bon de Cuisine offers you unique Vietnamese/French Cuisine. We have mouth watering Vietnamese style Sandwiches with a contemporary French flare. From our succulent Roasted Pork Belly to our sweet-onion apple marmalade. We mix and match Traditional Vietnamese ingredients with French techniques and sauces. A totally unique tasty spin on the traditional Vietnamese Sandwich. We also have soon to be world famous Garlic Noodles that is a must try. The executive chef, Jeffrey Nguyen is a classically trained chef that has worked in many of the best Asian and French restaurants in the Bay Area. He offers you only the freshest ingredients to produce a utterly delicious experience.
name: Le Bon de Cuisine
